{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DWR-510 |revision=A1 |asin= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=AzureWave |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/26/2011 |fcc_id=KA2WR510A1 |pcb_id= |type=travel router |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=USB Male-A |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88AP300 |cpu1_cspeed=624 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8786 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |addl_chips= |flags=3G, portable, |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= }} {{TagLine|Mini 3G 7.2 Mbps HSUPA USB Router}} :''Slim and Portable (Le Petit) 3G Router'' :[https://eu.dlink.com/uk/en/products/dwr-510-mini-3g-7-2-mbps-hsupa-usb-router Product page]
The FCC manual has www.azurewave.com on every single page. :OEM: [[AzureWave]] ([[AzureWave AW-NM313S|AW-NM313S]] ?)
*[http://www.speedguide.net/routers/d-link-dwr-510-slim-and-portable-le-petit-3g-router-2331 ''D-Link DWR-510'' on '''SpeedGuide'''] <!--:Mentions the default SSID is dlink_DWR-510, however, there is only one entry for this SSID in WiGLE-->
